predicate.note: Frames file for 'inject' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entry spray-9.7-1, other framed members include load, spread, stack, unload.

example.name: inject into
example.text: Analysts have estimated that [Pinnacle West]-1 may have *trace*-1 to inject between $300 million and $400 million into the MeraBank unit before turning the thrift over to federal regulators.
example.arg: before turning the thrift over to federal regulators

example.name: inject with
example.text: Mary injected John with a truth serum, which couldn't overcome John's inherent untrustworthiness.
example.arg: with a truth serum, which couldn't overcome John's inherent untrustworthiness
